text: Munenori Kawasaki (川﨑 宗則, Kawasaki Munenori) (born June 3, 1981) is a former Japanese baseball player. He last played for the Wei Chuan Dragons in 2019. He has also played for the Fukuoka SoftBank Hawks of Nippon Professional Baseball, from 2001 to 2011. He also played for the Seattle Mariners, and the Toronto Blue Jays. He also played for the Japanese national baseball team in the 2008 Summer Olympics and both the 2006 and 2009 World Baseball Classics. ==Other websites== *Official website (in Japanese) *Munenori Kawasaki's MLB player profile Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Seattle Mariners players Category:Toronto Blue Jays players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:People from Kagoshima Prefecture
title: Munenori Kawasaki
